title: Zero-rating Survey (South Africa)
desc: The following questionnaire investigates the reach of zero-rated services, in addition to possible relationships between zero-rating and mobile data usage in South Africa. Please answer all the questions in order to complete installation and open the MySpeedTest application.

title: Zero-rating Survey (Kenya)
desc: The following questionnaire investigates the reach of zero-rated services, in addition to possible relationships between zero-rating and mobile data usage in Kenya. Please answer all the questions in order to complete installation and open the MySpeedTest application.
